DOC.brief_summary: The CRB study is designed to study the safety and effectiveness of the Cook Cervical Ripening Balloon (CRB) for the induction of labor in term and near-term patients with premature rupture of membranes (PROM).
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of CRB in PROM Patients
DOC.criteria: PROM not in labor Contraindication to vaginal delivery Contraindication to labor induction Abnormal fetal heartrate patterns Maternal heart disease Severe maternal hypertension Pelvic structural abnormality
